description: This module contains functions to introspect a project.

functions.name: create-seed
functions.description: Creates and return new random project seed.
functions.summary: Creates and return new random project seed.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED-EXISTS the project already has a seed file</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED the specified seed is not at least 8 characters long</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: create-seed
functions.description:
Creates a new project seed.
 The specified seed must be at least 8 characters long.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED-EXISTS the project already has a seed file</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: has-seed
functions.description: Checks if the project has a seed file.
functions.summary: Checks if the project has a seed file.

returns.description: whether the project has a seed file or not

functions.name: name
functions.description: Returns the name of the project.
functions.summary: Returns the name of the project.

functions.name: read-or-create-seed
functions.description: Returns the project seed. If the project has no seed a new random one is created.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED-FILE error reading or writing the seed file</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: scheduler-host
functions.description: Returns the host of the scheduler.
functions.summary: Returns the host of the scheduler.

functions.name: seed
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:NO-SEED the project seed file cannot be found</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-seed
functions.description: Sets a new random project seed.
functions.summary: Sets a new random project seed.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED-FILE error reading or writing the seed file</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-seed
functions.description:
Sets the project seed.
 The specified seed must be at least 8 characters long.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED-FILE error reading or writing the seed file</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:SEED the specified seed is not at least 8 characters long</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: token
functions.description: Creates a new project token, that expires after 12 hours.
functions.summary: Creates a new project token, that expires after 12 hours.

functions.name: token
functions.description:
Creates a new project token, that expires at the desired date.
 The input to the function contains the expiration information.
 If a duration is used, then the function will create a token expiring after the specified duration.
 If a dateTime is used, then the function will create a token expiring that date.
 If an integer is used, then the function will create a token expiring after the specified number of seconds.
functions.summary: Creates a new project token, that expires at the desired date.

parameters.name: expiration
parameters.description: describes the expiration date of the token.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">project:INVALID-PARAMETER expiration information is invalid (not a duration, date or number of seconds)</xqdoc:error>
